name: HAKOSAN
description:
Lead the three little boxes to their destination!

CONTROLS

[Swipe]

[Arrow key] Move boxes

[WASD key]

[R]         Reset a level

[U]         Undo

INSTRUCTIONS

When you move the boxes, they will slide at the same time until they hit the wall. Try to make all three boxes arrive at the red destination at the same time.

Levels are automatically generated infinitely.
